Posts.Content: cap7744 wrote: Hi I am going through it with these drs. My primary ran blood work ordered by a breast surgeon everything came back fine so my primary just said some people have enlarged lymph nodes and to forget about it. How do you ignore this constant itch, pain and swelling my nipple is inverted breast surgeon said it was age related im 34 she also said it could be because I recently had a baby 4 months ago. They are sending me to a rheumatologist and a dermatologist. I see the rheumatologist on the 12th I dont see the dermatologist until the end of Oct. Ugh im so frustrated I know something is wrong why else would I have pain and itching? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: itchy left breast with pain and slight swelling cap7744 cap7744
